short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your browser tabs with Eazy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Are you tired of juggling dozens of open tabs in your Chrome browser? Look no further than Eazy Tab Manager! With its intuitive interface and powerful features, Eazy Tab Manager is the ultimate tool for effortless tab management.

Here are just a few of the incredible features that Eazy Tab Manager offers:

1. Easy navigation: Quickly find and switch to any open tab with just a click.

2. Search and find: Easily search and find the tab you need, even if you have dozens of tabs open.

3. Sorting: Sort your tabs in alphabetical order for quick and easy access.

4. Individual tab control: Close each tab individually with a click or restore them all.

5. Bulk tab control: Close all tabs with a single click or restore all tabs.

With Eazy Tab Manager, you can streamline your tab management process and save time and frustration. Plus, our extension is incredibly easy to use, so you can start enjoying the benefits right away.

Don't settle for subpar tab management any longer - install Eazy Tab Manager today and experience the power of effortless tab control in Chrome!"
